quote: Amin, you’re not making sense to me. Things have always been this way, since the beginning of time. Some die so others can be saved. You don’t believe in the salvation of others?
quote_letters: AMIN YOURE NOT MAKING SENSE TO ME THINGS HAVE ALWAYS BEEN THIS WAY SINCE THE BEGINNING OF TIME SOME DIE SO OTHERS CAN BE SAVED YOU DONT BELIEVE IN THE SALVATION OF OTHERS
